description: The contract is to be awarded for lodging and meals for up to 100 people per day at a site that will permit sailing exercises in the region of Montreal and Lanaudière, and must include storage space for equipment, canoes and a cafeteria
full_summary:
================================ ==
**Title:** W3934-22C266 - Lodging, Meals and Site Rental for Nautical Exercises in the Montreal and Lanaudière Region

**Reference Number:** WS3617554994-Doc3617593753

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Traditional

**Closing Date:** 2022-08-26 14:00:00 EDT

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13815487?extsite=MTM4MTU0ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13815487?extsite=MTM4MTU0ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND), Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking a contractual partner to provide lodging, meals, and site rental for up to 100 people per day for nautical exercises in the Montreal and Lanaudière region, Quebec, Canada. The hosting site must include storage space for equipment, canoes, and a cafeteria.

**Contract Terms:**

* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-08-31

**Specifications:**

* UNSPSC: 90101700, 90111700
* UNSPSC Description: Cafeteria services, Camping and wilderness facilities
* Regions of Delivery: Montreal
* Procurement Category: Service Related (SRV)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Trade Agreements:**

This Notice is open to suppliers under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Contact Information:**

Luc Brunet (SPAC/PSPC)
[luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

---

Please let me know if you'd like any modifications to the rewritten notice! 

### Word Count: 276 (under the 400-word limit)  ###

**Attachments:**

* [None]

**Modified Closing Time:**

Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell posting response deadline closing time.
